root.query: select company_name As name from m_company
select group_code, concat(group_code, '[',group_name, ' ', accounting_group_name,']') As GroupName from m_group

select mh.year , mh.month , mh.user_no as UserCode , u.user_name as UserName , mh.group_code as GroupCode , gr.group_name as GroupName , mh.theme_no as ThemeCode , th.theme_name1 as ThemeName , mh.work_contents_code as WorkContentCode , mh.work_contents_detail as WorkContentDetail , wc.work_contents_code_name as WorkContentCodeName from public.t_manhour as mh join public.m_theme as th on mh.theme_no = th.theme_no join public.m_group as gr on gr.group_code = mh.group_code join public.m_user as u on u.user_no = mh.user_no join public.m_work_contents wc on wc.work_contents_code = mh.work_contents_code and wc.work_contents_class = mh.work_contents_class where 1=1
and ((mh.year = :fromYear and mh.month >= :fromMonth) or (mh.year = :toYear and mh.month <= :toMonth) or (mh.year in(:fromYear +1,:toYear -1)))
and ((mh.year = :fromYear and mh.month >= :fromMonth) or (mh.year = :toYear and mh.month <= :toMonth))
and mh.year = :toYear and mh.month in(:fromMonth,:toMonth)
and :user = mh.user_no and :groupCode = mh.group_code
and :workThemeContent LIKE '%' || CONCAT(mh.theme_no, mh.work_contents_code, mh.work_contents_detail) || '%'
and :workThemeContent LIKE '%' || CONCAT(mh.theme_no, mh.work_contents_code) || '%'

select mh.year , mh.month , mh.user_no as UserCode , u.user_name as UserName , mh.group_code as GroupCode , gr.group_name as GroupName , mh.theme_no as ThemeCode , th.theme_name1 as ThemeName , mh.work_contents_code as WorkContentCode , mh.work_contents_detail as WorkContentDetail , wc.work_contents_code_name as WorkContentCodeName from public.t_manhour as mh join public.m_theme as th on mh.theme_no = th.theme_no join public.m_group as gr on gr.group_code = mh.group_code join public.m_user as u on u.user_no = mh.user_no join public.m_work_contents wc on wc.work_contents_code = mh.work_contents_code and wc.work_contents_class = mh.work_contents_class where 1=1
and ((mh.year = :fromYear and mh.month >= :fromMonth) or (mh.year = :toYear and mh.month <= :toMonth) or (mh.year in(:fromYear +1,:toYear -1)))
and ((mh.year = :fromYear and mh.month >= :fromMonth) or (mh.year = :toYear and mh.month <= :toMonth))
and mh.month <= :toMonth and mh.year = :toYear and mh.month >= :fromMonth
and :groupContent LIKE '%' || CONCAT(mh.group_code,mh.work_contents_code, mh.work_contents_detail) || '%'
and :workContent LIKE '%' || CONCAT(mh.work_contents_code, mh.work_contents_detail) || '%'
